overview: Monica Mayhem makes a wish and gets it! Yet everything isn't all it's cracked up to be in her "Perfect World". She goes from Make-Up Artist to superstar but starring in XXX films!!  Leading ladies Taylor St. Claire, Dru Berrymore and Gwen Summers suck, straddle and show her the ropes with Lee Stone, Colt Steel and Julian in this mouth-watering movie with a message!
title: The Wish
